title: Rito pls make League movies or anime.

replies.body:
If they do, hire a separate company so they don't end up spreading their resources and becoming...

Valve....

eugh

That's not going to happen for a while, World of Warcraft is only getting a movie now, and they have had much better lore than League does ATM. But while you're waiting there's some really good fan-made stuff:

1. [Lalala Demacia](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Xb8Jkw6mxFs) (also support the official channel [here](https://www.youtube.com/user/DuoWanLOL) for upcoming seasons).

2. [Zed X Syndra](http://imgur.com/a/8ltAH)

3. Countless Hentais if you're into that shit.
